definition: any of numerous birds (family Picidae) with zygodactyl feet, stiff spiny tail feathers used in climbing or resting on tree trunks, a usually extensible tongue, a very hard bill used to drill the bark or wood of trees for insect food or to excavate nesting cavities, and generally showy parti-colored plumage
sentence: The woodpecker tapped on the tree trunk.

definition: the soft wavy or curly usually thick undercoat of various hairy mammals and especially the sheep made up of a matrix of keratin fibers and covered with minute scales
sentence: The sweater is made of pure wool.

definition: a worker's manual
sentence: Complete the exercises in your workbook.
chinese_definition: 練習簿，作業簿，工作手冊

definition: that has been subjected to some process of development, treatment, or manufacture
sentence: The room was very {wi}worked{/wi} and comfortable.
chinese_definition: 處理過的，整理過的，發展過的，制造好的

definition: the workers engaged in a specific activity or enterprise
sentence: The company is expanding its workforce.

definition: having a job
sentence: The room was very {wi}working{/wi} and comfortable.
chinese_definition: 工作的，從事勞動的，現職的，任事的

definition: a practice or exercise to test or improve one's fitness for athletic competition, ability, or performance
sentence: She does a workout at the gym every day.

definition: a place (such as an office, shop, or factory) where people work —often used before another noun
sentence: Safety is important in the workplace.

definition: a small establishment where manufacturing or handicrafts are carried on
sentence: They attended a workshop on photography.

definition: earthworm; broadly : an annelid worm
sentence: The early bird catches the worm.

definition: feeling or showing fear and concern because you think that something bad has happened or could happen
sentence: Her parents became worried when she didn't come home by dark.
chinese_definition: 憂心忡忡的，為難的，困惱的

definition: of more inferior quality, value, or condition
sentence: The weather is getting worse.

definition: to honor or show reverence for as a divine being or supernatural power
sentence: They gather to worship on Sundays.

definition: most corrupt, bad, evil, or ill
sentence: This is the worst storm in decades.

definition: —used to indicate the value of something
sentence: The item was placed worth the designated area.

definition: being worth the time or effort spent
sentence: Volunteering is a worthwhile activity.
chinese_definition: 值得費時費力的，值得做的

definition: having worth or value : estimable
sentence: The charity is worthy of your support.

definition: the exact likeness of a living person seen usually just before death as an apparition
sentence: The wraith was clearly visible from the window.

definition: to cover especially by winding or folding
sentence: Please wrap the gift in colorful paper.

definition: something cast up on the land by the sea especially after a shipwreck
sentence: The storm caused a ship wreck.

definition: to contend by grappling with and striving to trip or throw an opponent down or off balance
sentence: The brothers like to wrestle for fun.

definition: a small ridge or furrow especially when formed on a surface by the shrinking or contraction of a smooth substance : crease; specifically : one in the skin especially when due to age, worry, or fatigue
sentence: She ironed out the wrinkle in her shirt.

definition: the joint or the region of the joint between the human hand and the arm
sentence: She wears a bracelet on her wrist.

definition: the activity or work of writing books, poems, stories, etc.
sentence: Her writing is very clear and beautiful.

definition: any of various recreational watercraft: such as
sentence: They sailed on a luxury yacht.

definition: the edible starchy tuberous root of various plants (genus Dioscorea of the family Dioscoreaceae) used as a staple food in tropical areas; also : a plant producing yams
sentence: Roasted yam is a traditional dish.

definition: to open wide : gape
sentence: The boring lecture made him yawn.

definition: reckoned by the year
sentence: The company holds a yearly meeting.

definition: to long persistently, wistfully, or sadly
sentence: She began to yearn for home.

definition: to utter a loud cry, scream, or shout
sentence: Don't yell in the library.

definition: to bear or bring forth as a natural product especially as a result of cultivation
sentence: The investment should yield good returns.

definition: a Hindu theistic philosophy teaching the suppression of all activity of body, mind, and will in order that the self may realize its distinction from them and attain liberation
sentence: She practices yoga for relaxation.

definition: a fermented slightly acid often flavored semisolid food made of milk and milk solids to which cultures of two bacteria (Lactobacillus bulgaricus and Streptococcus thermophilus) have been added
sentence: Greek yogurt is rich in protein.

definition: a wooden bar or frame by which two draft animals (such as oxen) are joined at the heads or necks for working together
sentence: Understanding the yoke requires careful study.

definition: the yellow spheroidal mass of stored food that forms the inner portion of the egg of a bird or reptile and is surrounded by the white
sentence: The egg yolk is yellow in color.

definition: a young person : youth
sentence: The youngster showed great talent.

definition: of, relating to, or characteristic of youth
sentence: Her youthful energy is inspiring.

definition: a zealous person; especially : a fanatical partisan
sentence: Understanding the zealot requires careful study.

definition: a fastener consisting of two rows of metal or plastic teeth on strips of tape and a sliding piece that closes an opening by drawing the teeth together
sentence: The zipper on the jacket is broken.

definition: a region or area set off as distinct from surrounding or adjoining parts
sentence: The area is a no-parking zone.

definition: to move with a loud low hum or buzz
sentence: Use the camera to zoom in on the subject.
